text: 11.46: Mt 23.4Ana ne nzuaim, Zisas ana ŋgarkarav khaŋ ana nzuai, “Nde guigira Zudaiŋ tɨvi kaŋgi gumgi, nde warir rɨvɨri. Nde khaŋ mbui tɨvi ga mbui. Nde bigi simtɨgi, nde nta ndiav, ntan harigi gumgi phufui, mbe ntan simtɨgi ndiav, ntan kavtuigi. Mbe ntan simtɨgi ndim, nde thaneŋ mben kurav mba simtɨgi ndi fhuvara.
